TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EasingMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: から派生したクラスがイージングを実行するモードを定義します。

span.span: Defines the modes in which classes derived from perform their easing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 次のグラフは のさまざまな値を示しています。 *f*(*t*) はアニメーションの進行状況を表し、 *t*は時刻を表します。The following graphs demonstrate the different values of , where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time. ![BackEase System.windows.media.animation.easingmode> グラフ。](~/add/media/backease-graph.png "BackEase EasingMode のグラフ。")![BackEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/backease-graph.png "BackEase EasingMode graphs.") ![BounceEase System.windows.media.animation.easingmode> グラフ。](~/add/media/bounceease-graph.png "BounceEase EasingMode のグラフ")![BounceEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/bounceease-graph.png "BounceEase EasingMode graphs.") ![CircleEase System.windows.media.animation.easingmode> グラフ。](~/add/media/circleease-graph.png "CircleEase EasingMode のグラフ")![CircleEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/circleease-graph.png "CircleEase EasingMode graphs.") ![System.windows.media.animation.cubicease> System.windows.media.animation.easingmode> グラフ。](~/add/media/cubicease-graph.png "CubicEase EasingMode のグラフ")![CubicEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/cubicease-graph.png "CubicEase EasingMode graphs.") ![ElasticEase には、さまざまな easingmodes のグラフがあります。](~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "異なる EasingMode の ElasticEase のグラフ")![ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![さまざまな easingmodes の ExponentialEase グラフ。](~/add/media/exponentialease-graph.png "異なる EasingMode の ExponentialEase のグラフ。")![ExponentialEase graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/exponentialease-graph.png "ExponentialEase graphs of different easingmodes.") ![QuarticEase には、さまざまな easingmodes のグラフがあります。](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "異なる EasingMode の QuarticEase のグラフ")![QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![さまざまな easingmode のグラフを含む QuadraticEase](~/add/media/quadraticease-graph.png "さまざまな easingmode のグラフを含む QuadraticEase")![QuadraticEase with graphs of different easingmodes](~/add/media/quadraticease-graph.png "QuadraticEase with graphs of different easingmodes") ![QuarticEase には、さまざまな easingmodes のグラフがあります。](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "異なる EasingMode の QuarticEase のグラフ")![QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![さまざまな easingmodes のグラフを簡単に使用できます。](~/add/media/quinticease-graph.png "異なる EasingMode の QuinticEase のグラフ")![QuinticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quinticease-graph.png "QuinticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![さまざまな System.windows.media.animation.easingmode> 値の SineEase](~/add/media/sineease-graph.png "異なる EasingMode 値の SineEase")![SineEase for different EasingMode values](~/add/media/sineease-graph.png "SineEase for different EasingMode values") ## XAML 属性の使用方法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode EaseIn = int32(0)

summary.span: イージング関数に関連付けられている数式に従って補間します。

span.span: Interpolation follows the mathematical formula associated with the easing function.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode EaseInOut = int32(2)

summary.span: アニメーションの前半は を、後半は を使用して補間します。

span.span: Interpolation uses for the first half of the animation and for the second half.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode EaseOut = int32(1)

summary.span: 100% の補間からイージング関数に関連付けられている数式の出力結果を差し引き、それに基づいて補間します。

span.span: Interpolation follows 100% interpolation minus the output of the formula associated with the easing function.
